author: todd
msg: HADOOP-7210. Chown command is not working from FSShell. Contributed by Uma Maheswara Rao G

author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1246: Adding runtime bean configuration for solr based search as an alternative.
You can copy alternate/search-embedded-solr-override.xml to override/ folder in order to use embedded solr engine.
Or, you can copy alternate/search-http-solr-override.xml to override/ folder in order to use external solr via http(s).
TODO: Test external http(s) configuration and documentation.
